tasks.name: Mindful Shower
tasks.description: Wake up your senses with presence
tasks.tips: Start with 30 seconds of cold water at the end of your shower. Focus on your breath and embrace the sensation mindfully.

tasks.name: Flow Movement
tasks.description: Move mindfully with yoga or stretching
tasks.tips: Spend 10-15 minutes moving your body with intention. Focus on the connection between breath and movement.

tasks.name: Read & Reflect
tasks.tips: Choose a book that inspires or educates you. Read without distractions and reflect on what you've learned.

tasks.name: Stillness Break
tasks.description: Sit in silence, let thoughts pass
tasks.tips: Find a quiet space and sit comfortably for 10-15 minutes. Observe your thoughts without judgment.

tasks.name: Deep Box Breathing
tasks.tips: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4. Repeat this cycle 10 times with full attention.

tasks.name: Soulful Nature Walk
tasks.tips: Walk slowly in nature for 20-30 minutes. Notice the sounds, smells, and sights around you with full presence.

tasks.name: Sunlight Ritual
tasks.tips: Step outside within the first hour of waking. Feel the warmth on your skin and set an intention for the day.

tasks.name: Mindful Push-ups
tasks.tips: Do 10-20 push-ups with complete focus on form and breath. Quality over quantity, presence over performance.

tasks.name: Mini Digital Detox
tasks.tips: Turn off all devices for at least 30 minutes. Use this time for reflection, journaling, or being present.

tasks.name: Learn & Grow
tasks.tips: Choose a topic that genuinely interests you. Take notes and reflect on how this knowledge can enhance your life.
